scenario_text.value: Yikes!

What are we going to do? We’re surrounded.
They’re sure to find us sooner or later.

Aaaugh!
This is so...so scary!
Erm...
You’re shaking with fear too, huh?

Me? No way.
I’m fine, don’t worry.

You stay here, Gabumon.
I’ll draw their attention away.
Don’t do that! It’s too dangerous!

I know it is.
But I want you to be safe.
Wait!
Ugh...

I couldn’t stop him...
Why does he act like that?

Oh, who am I kidding?
It’s because I can’t protect myself.

I wasn’t strong enough to help.
I wanted to but didn’t have the courage...

I’m too weak.
I can’t go on like this!

I have to get stronger.
Way stronger! Strong enough to protect him!
I should try to rescue him...
No, I WILL rescue him!
Huh? What’s this? What’s this light?
Aaaaaah!

My body, it’s...changed.
What just happened to me?

I feel strength surging inside me!
Is this the power of bonding with humans?

I can do this! Now I can fight!
Hold on! I’m coming for you!
Garurumon?!
Huh? What’s this light?
(He’s getting sucked into the light?!)
Hey, wait for me! Where’d you go?!
Don’t leave me behind! Come on!

Why is this happening?
Was our bond a lie this whole time?!
Raaaaaahrrr!
